remarks: Alternative expression for the supremum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Sep-2017.)
statement:
supmo.1 $e |- ( ph -> R Or A ) $.
supval2 $p |- ( ph -> sup ( B , A , R ) = ( iota_ x e. A ( A. y e. B -. x R y /\ A. y e. A ( y R x -> E. z e. B y R z ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
